Class.Name: Contains
Class.Description: Checks if a string contains an instance of a specified string, if true, it returns the index to the first instance matched.

Property.Name: Search From End
Property.Description: Start the match checking from the end of a string.

Property.Name: Case Sensitive
Property.Description: Take into account the case of the string when searching.

Out.Name: True
Out.Description: The string contains the provided pattern.

Out.Name: False
Out.Description: The string did not contain the provided pattern.

Property.Name: Index
Property.Description: The first index at which the substring was found.
